item.description: Took the day to go to my uncle's computer shop and installed Debian GNU/Linux Potato (which is a beta release with final release quality) for him with Helix Code's Gnome. This is the n-th attempt at converting him to see the light, but, for some reason, it appears that he was not as scared as in the previous attempts. Since my trustworthy S3 Trio64+ is giving signals of its age, I got a newer Tridend 3DImage750 to substitute it.
